definition: a person after one's heart (charming person)/capable person
can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very

sentences.english: Your attention please. Would the parent of Chloe Sanders please go to Cash Register 7 3) immediately .
sentences.chinese: 請注意，可兒山德斯的家長請即刻前往七號收銀臺。

sentences.english: Well wish to sister Chloe face reading in prison.
sentences.chinese: 頌恩如願與妹妹可兒在獄中相面。

sentences.english: Kerr gave birth to their son, Flynn, on Jan. 6, 2011.
sentences.chinese: 可兒在2011年1月6日生下的他們的兒子，費林。

sentences.english: Chloe opens her book and pats her lap for Buster to jump up.
sentences.chinese: 可兒打開她的書，輕拍自己的膝蓋，讓巴斯特跳上來。

sentences.english: Beautiful Princess Keren, won the King's favor.
sentences.chinese: 公主斑斕可兒，深得國王地溺愛。

sentences.english: Chloe picks at the strands around its front legs.
sentences.chinese: 可兒開始剝離繞在蜥蜴前腿的絲線。

definition: to write a poem using another poem's rhymes
variant of 瀟灑|潇洒[xiao1 sa3]
variant of 閒談|闲谈[xian2 tan2]
(literary) to practice medicine/to work as a pharmacist
random thoughts/(in book titles etc) impressions/jottings
Zhaoyang district of Zhaotong city 昭通市[Zhao1 tong1 shi4], Yunnan
lit. twin lotus flowers on one stalk/fig. a devoted married couple
